attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These golden handshakes are ill-deserved and unnecessary, fortunately the tax payers are now perfectly aware that MP's constituency homes are well decorated, cleaned, furnished, mortgage-(over)paid... and not even paid for by their own earnings!

Stop this madness! stop the MP's taking even more than they already have done!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
